isis.stitle: STEERING COLUMN ASSEMBLY, TILT/TELESCOPING - 2000, 4000, 8000 - GENERAL PRECAUTIONS

warning.para: This adjustable steering column assembly has components under spring tension. The tilt and telescoping adjustments should be in the full up position to minimize spring tension before removal from vehicle and/or disassembly. Wear eye protection and use caution to prevent injury.

caution.para: Do not allow the finish on the jacket tube outside diameter to be scratched, nicked or dented during disassembly or assembly as the finish is crucial to the telescoping action of the unit.

warning.para: All steering mechanisms are critical to personal safety. It is imperative that the instructions in this section are followed exactly. Failure to observe the procedures and instructions set out herein may result in loss of steering control.
